document_data.name: Brotherhood of Earth
document_data.mainbody: '''Brotherhood of Earth''' was a a religious ceremony undergone by all [[earthwalker]]s, the [[specialty priest]]s of [[Grumbar]], that celebrated their ability to summon an [[earth elemental]] upon reaching a certain level of skill.
document_data.Description: This ceremony was always preceded by a full day of the earthwalker fasting and praying. Afterwards, they would summon an earth elemental and bestow upon them gifts in the form of [[gemstone]]s and [[gold]]. These gifts, along with the good wishes of his faithful, were said to be carried away by the earth elemental back to the [[Great Mountain]], the [[divine realm]] of Grumbar.
